deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Three Musketeers
deck.description: Trio of powerful, independent markswomen, fighting for justice and honor. Disrespecting them would not be just a mistake, it would be a cardinal sin!

deck.name: Skeleton Barrel
deck.description: It's a Skeleton party in the sky, until all the balloons pop... then it's a Skeleton party on the ground!

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Bandit
deck.description: The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched. The mask keeps her identity safe, and gives her bonus cool points!

deck.name: Guards
deck.description: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.

deck.name: Dark Prince

deck.description: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings with the most hitpoints in the target area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Executioner
deck.description: He throws his axe like a boomerang, striking all enemies on the way out AND back. It's a miracle he doesn't lose an arm.

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: Guards
deck.description: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Night Witch
deck.description: Summons Bats to do her bidding, even after death! If you get too close, she isn't afraid of pitching in with her mean-looking battle staff.

deck.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Night Witch
deck.description: Summons Bats to do her bidding, even after death! If you get too close, she isn't afraid of pitching in with her mean-looking battle staff.

deck.name: Bandit
deck.description: The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched. The mask keeps her identity safe, and gives her bonus cool points!

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Giant
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.name: Goblin Gang
